channel.title: Jagex not giving ban apeals to auto'ers?
channel.description: well jagex updated the apeal page, and a couple of account's of mine were banned using aryan, so i thought yesterday i would try an apeal.. so i log in them and all it says is "this account is permanently banned" and thats it!! i asked on the official forums, they didnt know anything about it, this could just be that all aryan accounts that were caught autoing have been deleted, or just not being aloud to apeal. looks like im never getting my main back :)

item.title: Jagex not giving ban apeals to auto'ers?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:3, topic:3773”]I still have lots of my old aryan characters.

I have like 10 accounts with 60 mining still… Do you think I could get like 25 dollars for all 10 accounts(on another forum )?[/quote]

Buying and selling isnt really allowed but jamie do you think i could pay you 500k for one of your 60 miners? I’d die for one. PM me if your interested.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex not giving ban apeals to auto'ers?

item.title: Jagex not giving ban apeals to auto'ers?
item.dc:creator: @booduh booduh
item.description:
@booduh wrote:

They always say stuff like your accounts are gone, there’s no return or such.

Whine, lie, and make up excuses and you may get them back, they only delete about 10% of the accounts they ban and got appeal for, and 90% of the accounts that haven’t been appealed for.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex not giving ban apeals to auto'ers?

item.title: Jagex not giving ban apeals to auto'ers?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

well jagex updated the apeal page, and a couple of account’s of mine were banned using aryan, so i thought yesterday i would try an apeal… so i log in them and all it says is “this account is permanently banned” and thats it!! i asked on the official forums, they didnt know anything about it, this could just be that all aryan accounts that were caught autoing have been deleted, or just not being aloud to apeal.
looks like im never getting my main back

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex not giving ban apeals to auto'ers?
